metadata.title: CVE-2024-36481 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tracing/probes: fix error check in parse_btf_field()btf_find_struct_member() might return NULL or an error via theERR_PTR() macro. However, its caller in parse_btf_field() only checksfor the NULL condition. Fix this by using IS_ERR() and returning theerror up the stack.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
